history.proof: unfold find_pow2. apply le_n_S. sfirstorder depth: 3. qsimpl time: 1 use: pred,S.

exceptions.exn: In environment loop := fix loop (x n : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => 0 | S n0 => let (p, _) := div2 x in match p with | 0 => 0 | S _ => S (loop p n0) end end : nat -> nat -> nat loop_prop : forall n x : nat, x < n -> x < pow2 (S (loop x n)) x : nat The term "S (loop (Init.Nat.pred x) x)" has type "nat" while it is expected to have type "?x < ?n".

In environment n0, n : nat -> nat loop_prop : forall n x : nat, x < n -> x < pow2 ((fix loop (x0 n0 : nat) {struct n0} : nat := match n0 with | 0 => 0 | S n1 => let (p, _) := div2 x0 in match p with | 0 => 0 | S _ => S (loop p n1) end end) x n) + (pow2 ((fix loop (x0 n0 : nat) {struct n0} : nat := match n0 with | 0 => 0 | S n1 => let (p, _) := div2 x0 in match p with | 0 => 0 | S _ => S (loop p n1) end end) x n) + 0) Unable to unify "1 <= S ?M1540" with "1 <= n0 0".
[Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment n0, n : nat -> nat loop_prop : forall n x : nat, x < n -> x < pow2 ((fix loop (x0 n0 : nat) {struct n0} : nat := match n0 with | 0 => 0 | S n1 => let (p, _) := div2 x0 in match p with | 0 => 0 | S _ => S (loop p n1) end end) x n) + (pow2 ((fix loop (x0 n0 : nat) {struct n0} : nat := match n0 with | 0 => 0 | S n1 => let (p, _) := div2 x0 in match p with | 0 => 0 | S _ => S (loop p n1) end end) x n) + 0) x : nat IHx : 0 < n0 ((fix loop (x n : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => 0 | S n0 => let (p, _) := div2 x in match p with | 0 => 0 | S _ => S (loop p n0) end end) (n x) x) Unable to unify "S ?M1624 <= S ?M1624" with "1 <= n0 (let (p, _) := div2 (n (S x)) in match p with | 0 => 0 | S _ => S ((fix loop (x n : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => 0 | S n1 => let (p0, _) := div2 x in match p0 with | 0 => 0 | S _ => S (loop p0 n1) end end) p x) end)".

original: unfold find_pow2. apply le_n_S. apply lt_n_Sm_le. apply (loop_prop (S (loop (Init.Nat.pred x) x)) (Init.Nat.pred x)). induction x. - simpl. apply Nat.lt_0_succ. - simpl. apply Nat.lt_succ_diag_r.
